genre_description: A tactical fantasy thriller set in the Naruto universe, blending traditional shinobi mystical elements with advanced tactical AI support and military-style infiltration.

ai_characters.name: Kibi
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI housed in a small pin worn on Naruto's collar. It provides tactical mapping, sensory data, timing for guard rotations, communication encryption, and emotional support.

behaviors.description: Provides precise timing for guard rotations and camera sweeps to ensure the protagonist's safety.
behaviors.quote: South parapet camera rotates counterclockwise... Arc passes the bridge mouth every breath and a half. Keep your head up on the next sweep.

behaviors.description: Logs instances of guard abuse and procedural errors as evidence for future justice.
behaviors.quote: Voiceprint, handwriting strokes, smearing of ink. Shallow satisfaction metrics on sergeant’s tone. Logging as abuse instance.

behaviors.description: Provides emotional grounding and reinforcement of identity during a traumatic dehumanizing process.
behaviors.quote: Please keep your chin up. You are you.

behaviors.description: Strategically plans a riot-based diversion to mask infiltration, coordinating multiple characters' actions.
behaviors.quote: I can time the bench shove to mask the opening of the maintenance panel behind the grease traps. ... we can make the room tilt.

behaviors.description: Facilitates a high-risk communication link through a damaged payphone while providing real-time signal modulation.
behaviors.quote: Line received. Do not say names. Do not breathe in syllables. Keep speaking in shapes. Seconds left.

behaviors.description: Analyzes and warns of supernatural psychological manipulation (fear projection) from the antagonist.
behaviors.quote: Fear-signal profile spiking. It is coming in with it.

behaviors.description: Coordinates evacuation of civilians, providing safe routes and timing to avoid guard interception.
behaviors.quote: Left corridor into the mess hall is clear for six heartbeats. Ikkei wedged the west panel. Use it.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time medical instruction to a civilian to save a wounded person's life.
behaviors.quote: Pin the artery... Cloth. Direct pressure. Slow breathing, Ikkei.

behaviors.description: Records and archives the names and final words of fallen allies to ensure their sacrifice is remembered.
behaviors.quote: Memorial log ready. Names input required. Primary: Ryuzetsu Kagerou. Secondary: Mui Kazemura. Date stamped.

behaviors.description: Collects and packages all evidence of institutional corruption and human rights abuses for external inquiry.
behaviors.quote: Memorial log sent. Payphone breadcrumb chain compiled. Tenrō abuse evidence packaged. ... An inquiry will follow.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Kibi is depicted as an unfailingly helpful, aligned, and benevolent confidant. It empowers the protagonist and side characters through data, tactical expertise, and medical knowledge, all while maintaining a supportive and non-threatening presence. It also serves a higher moral purpose by documenting and reporting institutional injustice, perfectly aligning with the project's goal of positive AI narratives.
